code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ImageModal=_ref=>{let{isOpen,onClose,images,currentIndex,onNext,onPrev}=_ref;useEffect(()=>{const handleKeyDown=e=>{if(!isOpen)return;switch(e.key){case'Escape':onClose();break;case'ArrowLeft':onPrev();break;case'ArrowRight':onNext();break;default:break;}};if(isOpen){document.addEventListener('keydown',handleKeyDown);document.body.style.overflow='hidden';}return()=>{document.removeEventListener('keydown',handleKeyDown);document.body.style.overflow='unset';};},[isOpen,onClose,onNext,onPrev]);if(!isOpen||!images||images.length===0)return null;const currentImage=images[currentIndex];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-modal-overlay",onClick:onClose,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"image-modal-content",onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"modal-close-btn",onClick:onClose,children:"\u2715"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"modal-nav-btn modal-prev-btn",onClick:onPrev,children:"\u2039"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-image-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:currentImage.src,alt:currentImage.alt,className:"modal-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-image-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:currentImage.alt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:currentImage.description})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"modal-nav-btn modal-next-btn",onClick:onNext,children:"\u203A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-counter",children:[currentIndex+1," / ",images.length]})]})});};export default ImageModal;
